welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lynn, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and vibrant arts scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Lynn has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Rossetti's
restaurants.description: Rossetti's is a italian restaurant located in Lynn.

restaurants.name: The Blue Ox
restaurants.description: The Blue Ox is a burger joint located in Lynn.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights, offering amenities such as a lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network name provided.
